meanings.definition: The surgical removal of one or both gonads.
meanings.sent1: The veterinarian performed gonadectomies on the dog to improve its health.
meanings.sent2: After the gonadectomies, the cat no longer had the ability to reproduce.
meanings.sent3: The gonadectomies turned the rabbit into a 'bunny eunuch'!
meanings.sent4: The gonadectomies were like plucking the heart out of a flower.
meanings.sent5: The image of the gonadectomies lingered in my mind like a shadow.

meanings.definition: The process of sterilizing an animal by removing its reproductive organs.
meanings.sent1: The zoo performed gonadectomies on the elephant to prevent overpopulation.
meanings.sent2: Gonadectomies are common in shelters to control the pet population.
meanings.sent3: The gonadectomies left the monkey feeling like a 'spayed simian'!
meanings.sent4: The gonadectomies were a sharp knife cutting the ties to future generations.
meanings.sent5: The impact of the gonadectomies was as clear as a bell ringing in an empty room.
